content.description: Sit Start matched in jug, make a move up and right to rails then continue straight up.
content.location:
Hike the summit trail but continue past the summit and go straight at the right arrow sign. Continue down until you find the edge of the cliff band (climber's left) ... head across the mountain at this same level until you see the orange flagged trail. Stay off the slabs on this approach, if you end up too high you are bound to slide.

 Found in the center of the talus field, it is marked by a rock pile from above. The top side of the boulder is all filled in with other rock, so you have to be below it to see the problems.

content.description: Sit Start with right hand in jug and left hand at same level. Make one move up and left then straight up following the seam.
content.location:
Hike the summit trail but continue past the summit and go straight at the right arrow sign. Continue down until you find the edge of the cliff band (climber's left) ... head across the mountain at this same level until you see the orange flagged trail. Stay off the slabs on this approach, if you end up too high you are bound to slide.

 Found in the center of the talus field, it is marked by a rock pile from above. The top side of the boulder is all filled in with other rock, so you have to be below it to see the problems.

content.description: Talus field on the front side of the mountain below the cliff.
